Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/Lavergne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at Ellis/54th
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via 53rd, Drexel, 55th, and Ellis due to, construction near Ellis/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 53rd, Drexel, 55th, and Ellis due to, construction near Ellis/54th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Belmont
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Inner Lake Shore, Addison and Broadway, due to street blockage at Broadway/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Belmont, Inner Lake Shore, Addison and Broadway, due to street blockage at Broadway/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.
